mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.mobile, u.gender, u.avatar, u.STATUS, d.name AS dept_name, u.create_time FROM system_user u LEFT JOIN system_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id
u.deleted = 0 AND u.username != 'root'
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqVO.username} ,'%')
AND u.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqVO.mobile} ,'%')
AND u.dept_id = #{reqVO.deptId}
AND u.status = #{reqVO.status}
ORDER BY u.id ASC
